import React from 'react' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import Pulse from 'react-reveal/Pulse' import {faEnvelope, faPhoneSquareAlt} from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import '../../styles/contactItem.css' const CustomerItem = ({_id, first_name, last_name, address, address2, city, state, zip, email, phone, deleteContact, setCustomer}) => { let array = phone.toString().split("") array.splice(3, 0, "-") array.splice(7, 0, "-") phone = array.toString().split(",").join("") const onDelete = ()=> deleteContact(_id) const onSetContact = ()=> { let contact = { _id, first_name, last_name, address, address2, city, state, zip, email, phone: phone.split("-").join(""), } setCustomer(customer) } return (

{first_name}

{last_name}

{address}

{address2}

{city}

{state}

{zip}

{email}
{phone}
) } export default CustomerItem
